definition[0]: if a thick liquid oozes from something or if something oozes a thick liquid, that liquid flows from it very slowly
example[0]: A cut on his cheek was still oozing blood.
example[1]: The ice cream was melting and oozing out of its wrapper.
definition[1]: to show a lot of a particular quality or feeling
definition[2]: very soft mud, especially at the bottom of a lake or sea
definition[3]: a very slow flow of liquid
